extension.title: TMarks Browser Extension
extension.subtitle: Save tab groups with one click for efficient bookmark management
extension.tip: üí° 8 browser-specific versions available, or use Chrome version (supports all Chrome-based browsers)

saveTabGroups.title: One-click Tab Group Saving
saveTabGroups.description: Save all open tabs to TMarks with one click, including titles, URLs, and favicons

restoreTabs.title: Quick Tab Restoration
restoreTabs.description: Restore previously saved tab groups from TMarks website to continue your work

autoSync.title: Auto Sync
autoSync.description: Tab groups automatically sync to cloud for seamless multi-device access

step1.title: Download Extension Package
step1.description: Click the download button above to get the tmarks-extension.zip file

step2.title: Extract Files
step2.description: Extract the downloaded zip file to any folder (preferably a permanent location)

step4.title: Enable Developer Mode
step4.description: Toggle on 'Developer mode' in the top right corner of the extension management page

step5.title: Load Extension
step5.description: Click 'Load unpacked' and select the extracted folder

step6.title: Installation Complete
step6.description: The extension icon will appear in the browser toolbar, click to use

tips.title: üí° Usage Tips
tips.tip1: First-time use requires configuring TMarks website URL and API Key in the extension
tips.tip2: API Key can be created on the website's 'API Keys' page
tips.tip3: Pin the extension icon to toolbar for quick access
tips.tip4: Extension automatically saves tab titles, URLs, and favicons

faq.title: ‚ùì FAQ
faq.q1: Can't find the extension icon after installation?
faq.a1: Click the puzzle icon on the right side of the browser toolbar, find TMarks extension and click the pin button to show it in the toolbar.
faq.q2: How to get an API Key?
faq.a2: After logging into TMarks website, click 'API Keys' in the user menu at the top right, create a new API Key and copy it to the extension settings.
faq.a3: Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, Opera and other major browsers. Chrome and Edge use the same version (based on same technology), Firefox uses a dedicated version.
faq.q4: Can Chrome and Edge use the same version?
faq.a4: Yes! Chrome, Edge, Brave, Opera all use the Chrome version. Only Firefox needs the dedicated version.
faq.q5: Where to view saved tab groups?
faq.a5: View and manage all saved tab groups on the 'Tab Groups' page of TMarks website.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: TMarks is committed to protecting user privacy and data security. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

account.title: Account Information
account.description: When you register a TMarks account, we collect your username, email address, and encrypted password.

bookmarks.title: Bookmark Data
bookmarks.description: Bookmarks, tags, tab groups and other content you create, used only to provide service functionality.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: We may collect information about your use of the service, such as access time, IP address, browser type, etc., to improve service quality.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve TMarks services
usage.item4: Detect, prevent, and resolve technical issues

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We take multiple security measures to protect your personal information:
security.item1: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption
security.item2: Passwords are stored using industry-standard hashing algorithms
security.item3: JWT tokens are used for authentication
security.item4: Data is stored on Cloudflare's secure infrastructure

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access: You can access and view your personal information at any time
rights.modify: Modify: You can update or modify your personal information
rights.delete: Delete: You can request deletion of your account and all related data
rights.export: Export: You can export your bookmark data

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to:

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: TMarks uses the following third-party services:
thirdParty.cloudflare: Cloudflare: Provides hosting, database, and CDN services
thirdParty.note: These service providers have their own privacy policies, we recommend reviewing them.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. For significant changes, we will notify you via email or in-service notification. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

welcome.title: Welcome to TMarks
welcome.description: Thank you for using TMarks bookmark management service. By using our service, you agree to comply with the following terms of service. Please read these terms carefully. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.

service.title: 1. Service Description
service.description: TMarks provides online bookmark management services, including but not limited to:
service.item1: Creating, editing, deleting, and organizing bookmarks
service.item2: Tag system and tab group management

responsibility.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibility.description: When using TMarks services, you agree to:
responsibility.item1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
responsibility.item2: Protect your account security and not share login credentials
responsibility.item3: Be responsible for all activities under your account
responsibility.item4: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
responsibility.item5: Not abuse the service or interfere with other users

prohibited.title: 3. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.description: When using TMarks, you must not:
prohibited.item1: Upload or share illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, or infringing content
prohibited.item2: Attempt unauthorized access to other users' accounts or data
prohibited.item3: Interfere with or disrupt normal service operation
prohibited.item4: Use automated tools to excessively access the service
prohibited.item5: Copy, modify, or distribute any part of the service

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.description1: TMarks service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by TMarks and its licensors, protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
ip.description2: You retain all rights to content you create and upload. By using the service, you grant TMarks a license to use, store, and display your content to provide the service.

changes.title: 5. Service Changes and Termination
changes.description1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the service (or any part thereof) at any time, with or without notice. We are not liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or termination of the service.
changes.description2: You may stop using the service and delete your account at any time. We may also suspend or terminate your account for violating these terms.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: TMarks service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to:
disclaimer.item1: The service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free
disclaimer.item2: Results obtained through the service will be accurate or reliable
disclaimer.item3: Any errors in the service will be corrected

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, TMarks shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits, revenue, data, or use, whether based on contract, tort (including negligence), strict liability, or any other theory, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

termChanges.title: 8. Changes to Terms
termChanges.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. For significant changes, we will notify you via email or in-service notification. Continued use of the service after changes take effect indicates acceptance of the modified terms.

law.title: 9. Governing Law
law.description: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the People's Republic of China, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us:

about.subtitle: A modern smart bookmark management system to keep your bookmarks organized

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.description: Powered by Cloudflare's global network for lightning-fast access

secure.title: Secure & Reliable

opensource.description: TMarks is an open source project under MIT license. We welcome all forms of contributions, including but not limited to:

thanks.title: Acknowledgments
thanks.description: Thanks to all developers and users who contributed to TMarks, and the following excellent open source projects and services:

quickStart.description: Learn how to create your first bookmark and use basic features

extension.description: Install and configure browser extension for quick bookmark saving

importExport.title: Import & Export
importExport.description: Migrate data from other bookmark management tools

share.title: Public Sharing
share.description: Create public links to share your bookmark collection

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Click the 'Add Bookmark' button in the top right corner, fill in the bookmark information and save. You can also use the browser extension to quickly save the current page.
faq.a2: When creating or editing a bookmark, you can add tags to it. Click on tags in the sidebar to filter corresponding bookmarks.
faq.a3: Go to 'General Settings' ‚Üí 'Data' tab, select 'Import Data', and upload the HTML bookmark file exported from your browser.
faq.a4: Go to 'General Settings' ‚Üí 'Share' tab, enable public sharing, and the system will generate a public link for others to access.
faq.q5: How to get an API Key?
faq.a5: Go to 'General Settings' ‚Üí 'API' tab, click 'Create' button to generate a new API Key for browser extension or third-party apps.
faq.q6: How to install the browser extension?
faq.a6: Visit the 'Browser' page, download the extension file for your browser, and follow the instructions to install.
faq.a7: Go to 'General Settings' ‚Üí 'Basic' tab, choose light, dark, or system theme.
faq.a8: All data is encrypted and stored in Cloudflare D1 database, using JWT for authentication to ensure data security.

contact.title: Need More Help?
contact.description: If you haven't found the answer to your question, you can contact us through:
